title: Khloe Kardashian makes a bold statement in longline camouflage coat
text:
Khloe Kardashian opted for major volume on Monday as she was spotted wearing a massive longline coat in a camouflage print as she stopped by BFF Malika Haqq's home in Beverly Hills.

The reality star paired the look with oversize hoop earrings, a black top and matching skintight leggings.

Khloe, 35, also wore Adidas sneakers in a tweed print for her outing and carried a Prada shopping bag.

Bold: Khloe Kardashian opted for major volume on Monday as she was spotted wearing a massive longline coat in a camouflage print as she stopped by BFF Malika Haqq's home in Beverly Hills

The sighting comes on the heels of a Keeping Up With the Kardashians preview that revealed Khloe might have caught mom Kris Jenner in a lie.

At the start of the preview, Khloe is engaged in conversation with sister Kylie Jenner and divulges to her that in her ex Lamar Odom's new book Darkness to Light, she's unveiled a shocking fact.

'Lamar's writing a book,' Khloe began. 'In the book, I found out that mom's lying to me.'

The preview doesn't reveal what exactly the lie is about, but it seemed that Kris was fully aware that there's a mess to attend to.

'I'm trying to do damage control,' the momager said sedately as she paid close attention to scrolling her smartphone.

There is no formal confrontation between the mom and daughter duo in the preview, but Khloe appears surprised and upset by the revelation.

Four years later, they went their separate ways due to Odom's battles with addiction and infidelity.

The two finalized their divorce in 2016.
